metadata.description: From the Shuster award winning creators of Looking For Group and Gutters comes the light-hearted story of the most confident man in the world. Since 2003, Least I Could Do follows the adventures of Rayne Summers, an anti-hero by any standards, as he and his friends grow up together. There are laughs, boobs, tears and sex jokes. Also one story arc got us sued by Red Bull. True story.
metadata.name: Least I Could Do
